headline: Earnings live: UnitedHealth stock falls 19%, American Airlines slides, Texas Instruments pops, Logitech edges higher
summary: The fourth quarter earnings season kicks into high gear this week, with Big Tech results from Microsoft, Meta, Tesla, and Apple headlining the earnings calendar.

headline: AT&T Earnings Are Up Next. What Investors Are Expecting.
summary: AT&T  stock has started the year off badly—but shareholders will be hoping that the wireless carrier’s fourth-quarter earnings send a better signal to the market.  T-Mobile US  and  Verizon Communications  are on bad runs too, sliding around 9% and 3% respectively.  Wall Street is also worried that the success of  Apple  iPhone 17 will drive up churn rates and kickstart a price war with rival Verizon, which may be looking to make changes under new CEO Daniel Schulman.

headline: T Brings IoT Solutions to AWS Marketplace: Will it Boost Prospects?
summary: T launches an end-to-end IoT solution on AWS Marketplace, aiming to simplify adoption of IoT devices for small and medium sized businesses across sectors.

headline: Verizon Stock Before Q4 Earnings: A Sensible Buy or Risky Move?
summary: VZ eyes Q4 gains with new 5G offerings and strong wireless traction, but margin pressures and soft outlook cloud the picture.

headline: Verizon to report earnings January 30, 2026
summary: NEW YORK, Jan. 27, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE, Nasdaq: VZ) will report fourth-quarter 2025 earnings on Friday, January 30, 2026. The company will present results and provide a business update on a webcast beginning at 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time. Access instructions and fourth-quarter 2025 materials, including Verizon’s press release and financial tables, will be available at 6:30 a.m. ET on Verizon’s Investor Relations website, https://www.verizon.com/about/investors.

headline: Earnings live: UnitedHealth stock tumbles, UPS and General Motors rise
summary: The fourth quarter earnings season kicks into high gear this week, with Big Tech results from Microsoft, Meta, Tesla, and Apple headlining the earnings calendar.

headline: Bernstein Sees Tougher Competitive Landscape Taking Shape for Verizon (VZ) and Peers
summary: Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ) is included among the 15 Best S&P 500 Dividend Stocks to Buy in 2026. On January 16, Bernstein cut its price target on Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ) to $44 from $46, while sticking with a Market Perform rating. The firm said the industry looks like it is heading into a more aggressive […]

headline: 1 Profitable Stock with Exciting Potential and 2 Facing Challenges
summary: While profitability is essential, it doesn’t guarantee long-term success. Some companies that rest on their margins will lose ground as competition intensifies - as Jeff Bezos said, "Your margin is my opportunity".
